episode of.title: Ugly house to lovely house with george clarke (TV Series 2016– )

imdb.title: Ugly house to lovely house with george clarke
akas: Ugly house to lovely house with george clarke (United Kingdom)
plot: George clarke matches some of britain's most unloved houses with some of the country's leading architects, who join cutting-edge conception to a tight budget, proving that great design doesn't have to cost the earth.
